snippet: President Obama laid out a full agenda of economic and security issues, led by the tensions with China over its aggressive reclamation of land on disputed reefs and islands in the South China Sea.
abstract: Pres Obama meets with leaders of 10 Southeast Asian countries for Assn of Southeast Asian Nations summit in California; day-and-a-half meeting, in which Obama lays out full agenda of economic and security issues, is overshadowed by news of Justice Antonin Scalia's death and ensuing political battle over his replacement on Supreme Court.
lead_paragraph: President Obama laid out a full agenda of economic and security issues, led by the tensions with China over its aggressive reclamation of land on disputed reefs and islands in the South China Sea.

headline.main: An Asia Summit Meeting Is Overshadowed by Scalia
headline.print_headline: An Asia Summit Meeting Is Overshadowed by Scalia

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
